<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Charau-ka Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1430)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A charau-ka warrior carries hatchets, daggers, and similar weaponry on their person. They usually don't worry about running out of thrown weapons, as rocks plucked from the ground are just as deadly in their hands.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/CharauKa_Warrior.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Charau-ka Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1430)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Charau-ka" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=263" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 296 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thrown debris +7 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Shrieking Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** The charau-ka's turn begins; **Effect** The charau-ka is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of their turn and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. While in the frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, due to their loud wailing.

**Thrown Weapon Mastery**   Any weapon a charau-ka throws gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) weapon trait. Furthermore, when a charau-ka throws an improvised weapon, they do not take the –2 penalty for doing so, nor does they take a penalty for using a thrown improvised weapon with the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait to make a lethal attack.

</column>
